attributes.action: Give us the right to break absurd laws
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People should have the right to openly flout any of the many absurd laws passed by your government.

I have in mind specifically the Hunting Act 2004 which must be near the top of the list of legal gaffes.  I have been continually and openly breaking this piece of legislative incompetance since it came into force by deliberately setting dogs after wild deer with the full knowledge of the police.

People should be allowed to break all such absurd laws with impunity.  If they can't be enforced due to their ludicrous nature then you should have to change them.
